verses.plain: LORD, remember David, and all his afflictions:

tokens.t: , remember David,
all his afflictions:

verses.plain: How he sware unto the LORD, and vowed unto the mighty God of Jacob;

tokens.t: How he sware unto the
vowed unto the mighty
of Jacob;

verses.plain: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, nor go up into my bed;

tokens.t: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, nor go up into my bed;

verses.plain: I will not give sleep to mine eyes, or slumber to mine eyelids,

tokens.t: I will not give sleep to mine eyes,
slumber to mine eyelids,

verses.plain: Until I find out a place for the LORD, an habitation for the mighty God of Jacob.

tokens.t: Until I find out a place for the
, an habitation for the mighty
of Jacob.

verses.plain: Lo, we heard of it at Ephratah: we found it in the fields of the wood.

tokens.t: Lo, we heard of it at Ephratah: we found it in the fields of the wood.

verses.plain: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.

tokens.t: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.

verses.plain: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.

tokens.t: Arise, O
, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.

verses.plain: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; and let thy saints shout for joy.

tokens.t: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; and let thy saints shout for joy.

verses.plain: For thy servant David’s sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.

tokens.t: For thy servant David’s sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.

verses.plain: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.

tokens.t: The
hath sworn
truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.

verses.plain: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them, their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore.

tokens.t: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them, their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore.

verses.plain: For the LORD hath chosen Zion; he hath desired it for his habitation.

tokens.t: For the
hath chosen Zion; he hath desired
for his habitation.

verses.plain: This is my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.

tokens.t: This
my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.

verses.plain: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.

tokens.t: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.

verses.plain: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.

tokens.t: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.

verses.plain: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.

tokens.t: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.

verses.plain: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.

tokens.t: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.
